channel.title: Java Bug System
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [JDK-8322330] JavadocHelperTest.java OOMEs with Parallel GC and ZGC
item.description:
Either of two runs:
make test TEST=langtools/jdk/internal/shellsupport/doc/JavadocHelperTest.java TEST_VM_OPTS="-XX:+UseZGC -XX:+ZGenerational"
make test TEST=langtools/jdk/internal/shellsupport/doc/JavadocHelperTest.java TEST_VM_OPTS="-XX:+UseZGC"

cause

java.lang.IllegalStateException: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space

item.summary: JavadocHelperTest.java OOMEs with Parallel GC and ZGC

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
A pull request was submitted for review.
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk11u-dev/pull/2731
Date: 2024-05-31 19:07:59 +0000

Fix request ( 21u 17u 11u)

Clean backport. Fix for the test bug.
Review 21u-dev: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk21u-dev/pull/625
Review 17u-dev: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk17u-dev/pull/2517
Review 11u-dev: https://github.com/openjdk/jdk11u-dev/pull/2731

A pull request was submitted for review.
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk17u-dev/pull/2517
Date: 2024-05-31 23:27:29 +0000

A pull request was submitted for review.
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk21u-dev/pull/625
Date: 2024-05-31 05:22:43 +0000

A pull request was submitted for review.
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk22/pull/44
Date: 2024-01-09 13:58:26 +0000

Changeset: 52c7ff1d
Author: Thomas Schatzl <tschatzl@openjdk.org>
Date: 2024-01-09 13:47:32 +0000
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk/commit/52c7ff1d81940d6d0d1e3dd7ad0447c80708161c

A pull request was submitted for review.
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk/pull/17304
Date: 2024-01-08 13:23:02 +0000

I think this is a test bug, and the same as JDK-8318025 where the default testng heap size of 768M is just too small; some testing with G1 showed that minimum live set is 643M after full gc, and Parallel GC indicates that this can be up to 657m before it fails (so potentially more)
This is just too much.

Allowing 1g heap lets the test pass nicely.
